text: Power supply in the following areas will get affected on Thursday (January 7) between 9 a.m. and 2 p.m. in view of maintenance to be carried out at Old Pettai substation: Tirunelveli Town, Old Pettai, Gandhi Nagar, Thiruppanikarisalkulam, Vaagaikulam, Kunnaththur, Pettai, Pettai Industrial Estate, Paattapaththu, Abhishekapatti, Tirunelveli Town West Car Street, North Car Street and South Car Street.
title: Power shutdown on Thursday
